title: SchoolBoy Runaway
description:
“Ah, you scoundrel! Hurry up and study your lessons !” said the parents and put you under house arrest. Try to outsmart your parents and find a way to hang out with your friends. Corpse Party
Immerse yourself in the role of a schoolchild whom the parents punished for a bad grade at school, and try to escape from home without being noticed by father and mother.

system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series, 1GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 2.0)

game_info.Released By: N/A Ty Krays, The Poet (csrin) for files
